content: KH-EZ SS316 Screw anchor Ultimate screw anchor for quicker corrosion-resistant fastenings in concrete and grout-filled CMU (stainless steel 316, hex head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Time and labor-saving stainless steel screw anchor for concrete – especially suited for seismic, cracked concrete and grout filled CMU applications requiring an ICC approval Quicker and easier to install than wedge anchors – no cleaning, no high-accuracy torque wrench and no hammering required Optimized thread design for exceptional setting performance, superior load values and reduced edge distances and spacing Carbide cutting edges help to ensure easy setting even under critical conditions (such as high-strength concrete, used drill bits, rebar hits) Fully removable anchoring solution for use with standard ANSI-tolerance drill bits – no special tolerance drill bits required for these screw anchors Applications Attaching railings, handrails, safety barriers, guard rails and signs Secondary steel attachment Tunnel construction Stadium seating ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Stainless Steel, 316 Head configuration: Hex head Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete), ICC-ES report (masonry), LABC, Seismic Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Stainless Steel, 316 | Head configuration | Hex head | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), ICC-ES report (masonry), LABC, Seismic | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU) | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | PROFIS Software | Yes | Environmental conditions | Indoor, damp conditions, Outdoor | IBC compliance | IBC 2018 | Material composition | Stainless steel, 316 ### ITEMS- 2245579 -
